segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s actually kind of funny how no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like it’s a normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t realize how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as guilty for not warning him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and I can almost see it happening in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a silent movie, just waiting for the punchline.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to take a tumble, and the girl is just going to stand there and laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is the kind of thing that happens in cartoons, not real life.
segments.speaker: PAR
